pageContent: Background: Radical prostatectomy is often followed by long-lasting erectile dysfunction and urinary incontinence, with adverse effects on the quality of life and intimate relationship of patients and partners. We developed the ProCan intervention to ameliorate sexual and urological dysfunction after radical prostatectomy and examined its feasibility, acceptability and changes in sexual function.

metaData.source:
Sex or surgery--erectile dysfunction after radical treatment of localized prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19662774/
